title: Physical Traits that Attract an Aries Man

steps.title: The Aries man’s favorite body part is the head.
steps.content: The Aries man’s favorite body part is the head. While it may come as a surprise that such a sexual zodiac sign is more interested in what’s above your shoulders than below, it’s true. The constellation Aries is said to rule the head, possibly because a ram’s most prominent features are the curling horns on its head. [1] X Trustworthy Source Princeton University Leading academic institution devoted to expanding and sharing knowledge Go to source Men born under the sign of the ram know that the head of a potential mate – and all it has to offer – is her sexiest feature.

steps.title: Your face is the first thing an Aries man notices about you.
steps.content: Your face is the first thing an Aries man notices about you. He’s an expressive person whose feelings tend to be plastered all over his face. [2] X Research source That means he’s watching your face to gauge how you’re feeling. Don’t play it too cool. Let him see you smile at things you like and frown at things you don’t. He’ll take it as a sign that you’re a genuine person, something he truly values.

steps.title: Aries appreciates a strong, fit body.
steps.content: Aries appreciates a strong, fit body . Yes, his favorite body part is the head, but Aries is an active guy. He needs a partner who is athletic enough to keep up with him. You don’t have to have a perfect hourglass figure – though that’s perfectly fine with him, too – as long as you have a little bit of muscle underneath those curves. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Aries likes to look deeply into your eyes.
steps.content: Aries likes to look deeply into your eyes. They say that eyes are the windows to the soul, and Aries certainly takes that to heart. As an intensity junkie, the Aries man likes to turn up the heat with direct eye contact. If you can hold his gaze, he sees it as a sign of confidence or a challenge...which he can’t resist. [4] X Research source Be careful not to maintain eye contact for too long without glancing away. This can feel offputting. You should try to make eye contact naturally during your conversation.

steps.title: Aries is attracted to women with long hair.
steps.content: Aries is attracted to women with long hair. Long hair is a sign of femininity, making it irresistible to Aries. As one of the most masculine signs in the zodiac, the Ram likes his women to be feminine . This guy is going to be mesmerized when you perform a flirty hair flip or twirl it around your finger, so don’t be afraid to pull out these tried-and-true tactics to catch his eye. Don’t worry if you’ve got shorter hair, as long as you rock your style with confidence, the Aries man is going to take notice.

steps.title: The Ram finds a spray of freckles across your nose adorable.
steps.content: The Ram finds a spray of freckles across your nose adorable. Aries likes authentic women who don’t feel the need to hide every supposed flaw. He’s also attracted to women who are active and down to earth. Not only are freckles a sign that you’re not averse to spending a little time in the sun, but they also signal you’re comfortable in your own skin. If you have freckles and are interested in an Aries man, don’t cover them up with heavy makeup. That’s not to say you can’t wear any makeup; he’s fine with seeing the best version of the real you.. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Aries men adore feminine women.
steps.content: Aries men adore feminine women. This manly man wants to be the hero who rescues the damsel in distress. While they enjoy a partner who likes to be active, they also want a woman who knows how to dress and act like a delicate lady. They’re drawn to feminine women like a magnet, so don't be afraid to embrace your feminine side by wearing a dress or spritzing on a seductive perfume. Authenticity is also important to the Ram, so don’t step too far out of your comfort zone or he might sense your discomfort.

steps.title: An intelligent woman is the perfect match for an Aries man.
steps.content: An intelligent woman is the perfect match for an Aries man. The Ram likes sports, but he’s not your typical jock. These guys like to read and learn new subjects and then have deep conversations about them. An intelligent conversation with an appealing woman is a huge turn-on for him. [6] X Research source

steps.title: The Ram is strongly attracted to confident women.
steps.content: The Ram is strongly attracted to confident women. It’s no secret that Aries can be confident to the point of cockiness. He’s got a big personality and isn’t afraid to show it. It takes a confident woman to get his attention, but once he takes notice, he can’t get enough. There are some who say feminine confidence is like an aphrodisiac to Aries guys. Don’t worry if you have trouble feeling confident – and getting a word in edgewise – when you’re talking with someone with an Aries-sized personality. They can also appreciate a woman who listens to their stories and laughs at their jokes. However, if you’re a good listener who also projects confidence , he’ll be putty in your hands in no time.

steps.title: Aries likes a woman with a sharp sense of humor.
steps.content: Aries likes a woman with a sharp sense of humor. The Ram is known for his sense of humor. He’s always down for dropping a clever bit of wordplay or a saucy double entendre. [7] X Research source If you aren’t laughing at their jokes, they might think you aren’t interested – or worse, not brainy enough to get his clever sense of humor – and move on. Make an effort to develop your sense of humor to win his heart. This could be as simple as paying closer attention while watching comedies or stand-up routines to see what makes people laugh.

steps.title: The Ram needs a passionate partner.
steps.content: The Ram needs a passionate partner. Aries is a fire sign, so these men always seem to have fire in their eyes, both in and out of the bedroom. While they certainly enjoy passionate conversations, men born between March 21 and April 19 have a reputation for hot tempers and hotter sex lives. Aries loves the thrill of the chase. If you want them to hang around, don’t give in to their blistering charm too soon. If you’re too easy to win over, they’ll be off to the next conquest before you’ve had a chance to catch your breath. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Spontaneity is a must for the Aries man.
steps.content: Spontaneity is a must for the Aries man. There’s no getting around it. Rams are impulsive. [9] X Research source If you aren’t down to go on a last-minute adventure, they might brand you a stick in the mud and race off to find a more free-spirited woman. You don’t have to drop everything to hit the road with them every single time, just be willing to on the occasional last-minute road trip.

steps.title: Aries craves physical affection.
steps.content: Aries craves physical affection. It may come as a surprise, but the fast and furious Ram loves public displays of affection. You’ll notice him grabbing your hand while you’re hiking on a trail or sweetly kissing the top of your head while watching a movie. Touch is his love language. [10] X Research source Show him you’re feeling it, too, with gentle head-scratching or a scalp massage.

steps.title: The Ram enjoys a very active lifestyle.
steps.content: The Ram enjoys a very active lifestyle. Aries is an energetic guy. [11] X Research source He doesn’t just like to work out; he needs to, or he’ll get restless and snappy. “Aries is ruled by the planet Mars, the god of war, so any way to get their aggression out is where you will find Aries,” Garbis advises. The Aries man loves sports and outdoor activities like rock climbing and hiking. They also have a habit of throwing themselves into strenuous DIY home improvement projects to work out some of that boundless energy. You don’t have to take up mountain climbing, but be open to trying new things, like taking a hike or going for a jog , to show your Aries man you can keep up with him.

steps.title: Aries men are suckers for a nice compliment.
steps.content: Aries men are suckers for a nice compliment. When it comes to Aries, flattery will get you everywhere…as long as you’re sincere. “They love attention and hate being alone with no one telling them how great they are,” Garbis adds. Aries can be brutally honest. If they sense your compliments aren’t genuine, it can actually hurt their feelings. Only give him compliments you truly mean, and he’ll know how much you appreciate him.

steps.title: The Aries guy is very competitive.
steps.content: The Aries guy is very competitive. They don’t just want to win; they need it. [12] X Research source It’s no surprise since Aries has a cardinal sign, which also makes him a natural leader. The Ram is a bit of a showoff who always wants the world to know just how good he is. This doesn’t mean he wants you to let him win. His competitive spirit won’t be satisfied unless he beats an opponent fair and square. Whether you’re playing a board game or racing him to the top of the hill, fight hard to the very end, and your Aries man will love you even more.

steps.title: Rams are very affectionate when they’re in love.
steps.content: Rams are very affectionate when they’re in love. When you start spending time with an Aries man, expect him to be brash, bold, and…uncommitted. Don’t let it worry you too much if he’s not ready to say “I do” just yet. An Aries man might rush into and out of a relationship with blinding speed, but when he realizes he’s in love, he’s in it for the long haul. In fact, these guys have a habit of putting the women they love on a pedestal, so be prepared for him to treat you like a goddess. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Aries men like to fight.
steps.content: Aries men like to fight. These guys love passionate debates a little too much. If a Ram gets really into a heavy conversation, his competitive nature and brash manner of speaking can tip it over into a full-blown argument. It’s not all bad, though. Garbis says, “If an Aries is fighting with you, then they fiercely love you but may need to find better ways to understand or express it.” He really needs a partner with a cool head who isn’t afraid to stand up for herself. [14] X Research source
